Title: The Sinnerman
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jenn Kao, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)

Plot: Lucifer and Chloe come face-to-face with the Sinnerman.
